import {Button, Card, ProgressBar, Stack} from 'react-bootstrap' export default function BudgetCard({clubData}) { return clubData.map((club) => { console.log(club) return (
{club.clubName}
club brand
Avg Distance: 150 Yards Longest Shot: 200 Yards
Total Shots: 10 {club.totalShots}
) }) }
